content: rights reserved 9 washcloth wednesday week 9 gauge 20sts to 10 cm 4 in pattern uk pattern commence with 41ch add/subtract multiples of 2ch to vary width row 1 starting in 2nd chain from hook *decrease 1ch repeat from * to last 2ch decrease 1 further double_crochet in final chain turn - 40 sts row 2 1ch *decrease inserting hook through both loops of first st or into chain-1 space if you find it easier and flo of next st 1ch repeat from * to last 2sts decrease using both loops of first st or into chain-1 space as before and flo of next st 1 further double_crochet in final st turn - 40 sts repeat row 2 until piece measures 20 cm 8 long or as desired us pattern commence with 41ch add/subtract multiples of 2ch to vary width row 1 starting in 2nd chain from hook *decrease 1ch repeat from * to last 2ch decrease 1 further single_crochet in final chain turn - 40 sts row 2 1ch * decrease inserting hook through both loops of first st or into chain-1 space if you find it easier and flo of next st 1ch repeat from * to last 2sts decrease both loops of first st or into chain-1 space as before and flo of next st 1 further single_crochet in final st turn - 40 sts repeat row 2 until piece measures 20 cm 8 long or as desired © thomasina cummings designs 2015 all rights reserved 10 washcloth wednesday week 10 gauge 20sts to 10 cm 4 in pattern special stitch double_crochet-htr2tog us single_crochet-hdc2tog - insert hook in next chain/st and draw up a loop yrh yo insert hook into next chain/st and draw up a loop draw yarn through 4 loops on hook uk pattern commence with 41ch add/subtract multiples of 2ch to vary width row 1 starting in 2nd chain from hook *double_crochet-htr2tog 1ch repeat from * to last 2ch double_crochet-htr2tog 1 further half_double_crochet in final chain turn - 40 sts row 2 1ch *double_crochet-htr2tog 1ch repeat from * to last 2sts double_crochet-htr2tog using chain-1 space and next st 1 further half_double_crochet in final st turn - 40 sts repeat row 2 until piece measures 20 cm 8 long or as desired us pattern commence with 41ch add/subtract multiples of 2ch to vary width row 3 starting in 2nd chain from hook *single_crochet-hdc2tog 1ch repeat from * to last 2ch single_crochet-hdc2tog 1 further half_double_crochet in final chain turn - 40 sts row 4 1ch * single_crochet-hdc2tog 1ch repeat from * to last 2sts single_crochet-hdc2tog using chain-1 space and next st 1 further half_double_crochet in final st turn - 40 sts repeat row 2 until piece measures 20 cm 8 long or as desired © thomasina cummings designs 2015 all rights reserved 11
